t: Amazon.com: : All Departments
s: As you know, you can schedule shoppable content 2-90 days ahead of time. Now, you can edit and reschedule your content. For scheduling, upload as usual. Tap on the ‘Schedule’ button and pick a date/time. Once approved, it’ll be scheduled on your chosen date and time.
